title: With Democratic presidential debate looming, Bernie Sanders calls for tougher gun laws
text: Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders Rick Scuteri / AP Speaking at a Tucson rally, Democratic presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders called for stiffer gun controls and improved mental health services to address the country's spate
